about.info: Digital HTML 6 Smell and Scent Tags

smell.info: These are the attributes of the smell Tag
smell.id: ID number to tell the browser of the smell/smells to identify from a central database
smell.detect: browser Auto Detects, Permission, parameters: AUTO, ON, OFF, ASK, auto disable
smell.strength: Sets the strength of the sensor 0to10

source.info: The source of the Database you would like to use
source.id: Databse ID Optional for Open source database
source.password: Password for secure and private databses
source.default: Uses the webs default database if none is specified

message.info: Messages to the user on how to provide the smell
message.warning: A warning message if needed for collection of Toxic samples or in general.
message.help: A meesge to the user on how to provide the best sample

sample.info: What the smell smple is going to be collected
sample.Permission: Human samples may need special permissions, nature and animals are other sources
sample.type: Specify the type for browsers and devices may be set in the ID tag

visual.info: How is the smell tag visible onthe page? Maybe as link to a button, video, image and text
visual.complicance: There could be some kind of compliance certificate a person could click to verify the datbase and source the smell tag is being sent to

activation.info: There may be smells that can be only collected at cetain times of day to be effective
activation.date: date or range when it need to be collected

smell.script: Allows the attachment of javascipt etc to run custom methods on the Tag
